Else
IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2018/KER/708
PRESENT:
THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA
MONDAY, THE 8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 18TH POUSHA, 1939
Cr1.MC.No. 4679 of 2014
CRIME NO. 421/2014 OF SREEKRISHNAPURAM POLICE STATION, PALAKKAD DISTRICT.
PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED NOS.1 TO 3:
1 RAMYA, AGED 22 YEARS,
D/O. LATE MURALEEDHARAN,
ATHIRA NIVAS, THANNEGATHU,
VIYYUR, THRISSUR.
2 SOUMYA, AGED 26 YEARS,
D/O.LATE MURALEEDHARAN, ATHIRA NIVAS,
THANNEGATHU, VIYYUR, THRISSUR.
3 SARASWATHI AMMA, AGED 56 YEARS,
W/O.LATE MURALEEDHARAN, ATHIRA NIVAS,
THANNEGATHU, VIYYUR, THRISSUR.
BY SRI.P.VIJAYA BHANU (SENIOR ADVOCATE)
ADVS.SRI.ALAN PAPALI
SRI .M. REVIKRISHNAN
SRI .V.C.SARATH
RESPONDENT (S) /COMPLAINANT & STATE:
1. SANIL KUMAR,
S/O.LATE SUKUMARAN, KUNDURKUNNU,
SREEKRISHNAPURAM, PALAKKAD-679 103.
2. STATE OF KERALA,

HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM - 682 031.

THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD
ON 08-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE
FOLLOWING:
mbr/

BRE
Cr1.MC.No. 4679 of 2014 () 2018/KER/708
APPENDIX

PETITIONERS ' ANNEXURES :

ANNEXURE-A. TRUE COPY OF THE PRIVATE COMPLAINT PREFERRED BY THE
1ST RESPONDENT BEFORE THE COURT OF THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS
MAGISTRATE, OTTAPALAM.

ANNEXURE-B. TRUE COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.421/2014 AGAINST THE
PETITIONERS.

ANNEXURE-C. TRUE COPY OF THE PARTITION DEED IN FARM OF THE MURALEEDHARAN
RELATING TO THE PROPERTY IN SY.NO.210/1 DATED 20/09/2004.

ANNEXURE-D. TRUE COPY OF THE COMPLAINT LODGED BY THE 1ST PETITIONER BEFORE
THE CIRCLE INSPECTOR OF POLICE, CHERPULASSERY
DATED 26/12/2012.

ANNEXURE-E. TRUE COPY OF THE SETTLEMENT BETWEEN THE 1ST PETITIONER AND THE
1ST RESPONDENT/COMPLAINT MADE IN FRONT OF THE CIRCLE INSPECTOR
OF POLICE, CHERPULASSERY DATED 10/1/2013.

ANNEXURE-F . TRUE COPY OF THE OWNERSHIP CERTIFICATE OF THE BUILDING
NUMBERED 10/498 BELONGS TO THE LATE MURALEEDHARAN IN
SY.NO.210/1 IN THE 7 CENTS OF PROPERTY OBTAINED FROM THE
KARIPUZHA GRAMA PANCHAYATH DATED 30/7/2014.

ANNEXURE-G. TRUE COPY OF THE COMPLAINT FILED BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST
CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT NO-I, THRISSUR DATED 1/4/2013.

ANNEXURE-H. TRUE COPY OF THE COUNTER AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE 1ST RESPONDENT
IN MC NO.4/2014 BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE
COURT NO-I, THRISSUR DATED 12/8/2014.

ANNEXURE-TI. TRUE COPY OF THE NATIONAL SAVING CERTIFICATE NO.60DD 065788
DATED 4/7/2011 OF RS.5,000/- AS SECURITY FOR REGISTRATION
UNDER KVAT ACT 1963 IS RELEASED TO THE 1ST PETITIONER FROM
COMMERCIAL TAX OFFICER.

ANNEXURE-J. TRUE COPY OF THE NOTICE ISSUED BY THE COMMERCIAL TAX
DEPARTMENT U/S.67(1) (C) OF THE KVAT ACT, 2002, TO UNIVERSAL
PAPER PRODUCTS DATED 18/7/2013.

ANNEXURE-K. TRUE COPY OF THE DETAILS FROM THE COMMERCIAL TAX DEPARTMENT
REGARDING THE iST PETITIONER HAS STOPPED THE BUSINESS.

ANNEXURE-L. TRUE COPY OF THE REQUEST GIVEN TO THE COMMERCIAL TAX OFFICER,
OTTAPALAM FOR CLOSURE OF HIS BUSINESS BY THE
1ST RESPONDENT/COMPLAINT DATED 30/6/2011.

ANNEXURE-M. TRUE COPY OF THE TAX RECEIPT ISSUED BY THE KARIMPUZHA GRAMA
PANCHAYATH DATED 30/3/2005.

RESPONDENTS ' ANNEXURSS : NIL

/TRUE COPY/
P.S.TO JUDGE

2018/KER/708
B. KEMAL PASHA, J.

"Dated this the 8" day of January, 2018
ORDER
Learned Public Prosecutor has reported that the final
report has been filed in the maiter, and after investigation,
the case has been referred. Recording the said submission,
this Crl.M.C. is disposed of.
Sd/- B. KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE.
